com.mp3player.vdp

Class VDP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mp3player.vdp.VDP

  • public class VDP
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for setting up a virtual distributed platform.

    • Method Detail

      • connectToMulticastAddress

        public void connectToMulticastAddress(java.lang.String multicastAddress)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to a virtual IP address and returns immediately. If other peers are found at that address or later connect to it, they are added to the list of peers, see getAllPeers() and the onPeerConnected-listener is informed, see setOnPeerConnected(Consumer).
        Parameters:
        multicastAddress - a multicast address (in the range 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255 for IPv4)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the address cannot be connected to
